about_me_content: I am a student of the Warsaw University of Life Sciences in the field of computer science. I have a year and a half of experience in the IT industry behind me. During this time, I successfully completed larger team projects, such as web applications with wine recipes, implementation of the program at the client's site.
ability5: - willingness to constantly develop and increase knowledge
experiance_company1_desc: Implementation of the program facilitating the accounting of their documents in the company, working with data from SQL Server Management Studio
experiance_company2_desc: Full-stack developer. I develop software on the .NET framework, applications based mainly on the MVC architecture or the Blazor platform
education_hight_school: III LO im. Płk D. Czachowskiego Radom
hobby_header: What do you like to do in free time? I like spend my free time on sport and overcoming yourself new challenges.
muay_thai_content: Training martial arts gives me great joy and allows me to push my own limits of pain.
running_content: Running (mainly over long distances) helps me relax and gather strength for new challenges. I am in the process of writing applications that will create a training plan for runners, the link to which will appear soon :)
climbing_content: On days outside of training, I like to spend my free time actively, for example on a climbing wall or volleyball.
